p: Two isolates (AKM5 & AKM6) from those, which identified to be Bacillus species, were chosen to be additionally confirmed via 16S rRNA gene sequence analysis using the BLASTn tool of the National Center of Biotechnology Information (NCBI). The isolate AKM5 was related to Bacillus oceanisedimins and the isolate AKM6 was related to Brevibacillus invocatus. Our sequences were submitted to the GenBank database with the accession numbers KX863513 for AKM5 isolate and accession number KX863514 for AKM6 isolate ( Table 3).
